summary: Andorra is a small, landlocked country in Europe, nestled in the Pyrenees mountains between France and Spain. It has a long history, dating back to Charlemagne. The country is led by two co-princes: a bishop from Spain and the president of France. With a population of around 79,000, it is one of the smallest countries globally. The capital, Andorra la Vella, is the highest capital city in Europe. Catalan is the official language, but people also speak Spanish, Portuguese, and French. Tourism is a significant part of Andorra's economy, attracting millions of visitors each year.
title: Andorra
